name: Untitled Phoenix Game
description:
Ludum Dare 46 Entry

Untitled Phoenix Game is a puzzle platformer where you have to maneuver in a cave to keep your friend alive and get out.

Explore the cave and find a way out.

Made using:
Engine: Unity
Art: Pyxel Edit
Sound: FL Studio

Controls:
Move Left:  A
Move Right: D
Jump:  Spacebar
Fly:  Shift
Pick up:   Left click
Throw:  Right click

Art : CptFinn  @anders_wagner
Programming : Rasmus Clausen @_Rasmus_Clausen
Sound Design: Simon Weber @SimonVWebs

V1.0.1 Uploaded 14 minutes past submission time: Fixed moving platforms
